accounts.name: seller
docs: Seller's wallet

docs: Seller's token account for the NFT to sell

accounts.name: mint
docs: Mint of the NFT to sell.

accounts.name: bidMint
docs: The SPL token mint to use for bids (e.g. FOXY). Use NATIVE_MINT for SOL.

accounts.name: vaultAccount
docs: Auction config's token account for the NFT

accounts.name: auctionConfigBidTokenAccount
docs: Auction config's token account for the bid token (e.g. FOXY)

accounts.name: auctionConfig
docs: Auction config holding information about the auction

accounts.name: bidHistory
docs: Bid history holding all bids made

accounts.name: bidHistory
docs: Bid history holding all bids made

accounts.name: seller
docs: Payer for fees to settle the auction

accounts.name: sellerBidTokenAccount
docs: Seller's token account for the bid token (e.g. FOXY)

accounts.name: mint
docs: Mint of the NFT to sell.

accounts.name: bidMint
docs: The SPL token mint to use for bids (e.g. FOXY). Use NATIVE_MINT for SOL.

accounts.name: metadataAccount
docs: Metadata for the mint is used to distribute royalties.

accounts.name: auctionConfig
docs: Auction config holding information about the auction

accounts.name: auctionConfigBidTokenAccount
docs: Auction config's token account for the bid token (e.g. FOXY)

accounts.name: feeAccount
docs: Account to receive fees

accounts.name: buyer
docs: Highest bidder of the auction

accounts.name: seller
docs: Seller's wallet

accounts.name: bidderTokenAccount
docs: Highest bidder's token account for the NFT

accounts.name: mint
docs: Mint of the NFT to claim.

accounts.name: metadataAccount
docs: Metadata for the mint is used to distribute royalties.

accounts.name: vaultAccount
docs: Auction config's token account for the NFT

accounts.name: auctionConfig
docs: Auction config holding information about the auction

fields.name: seller
docs: Seller of the NFT

fields.name: mint
docs: Mint account of the NFT

fields.name: bidMint
docs: Mint account of the bid token (e.g. FOXY)

fields.name: startTime
docs: Start time as unix timestamp

fields.name: originalEndTime
docs: End time as unix timestamp configured by the seller

fields.name: endTime
docs: End time as unix timestamp that can be updated by extension

fields.name: highestBidAmount
docs: The current highest bid amount

fields.name: highestBidder
docs: The current highest bidder or the seller's address if no bids have been made

fields.name: reservePrice
docs: The minimum bid price

fields.name: minBidIncrement
docs: The minimum increase in bid price from the previous bid as bps

fields.name: timeExtPeriod
docs: Time in seconds before the end time where an extension will be made when bidding

fields.name: timeExtDelta
docs: Time in seconds to increase the end time by when an extension is made

fields.name: royaltyBps
docs: Basis points of the royalty amount to pay to creators (e.g. 10000 for full royalties, 5000 for half royalties)

fields.name: fullPrimarySale
docs: Pay the full sale amount to creators on primary sale, otherwise only the royalty amount will be paid

fields.name: fox
docs: True if auction is created by a fox holder (gets reduced fee)

fields.name: isSettled
docs: True if auction has been settled

fields.name: isClaimed
docs: True if auction has been claimed

fields.name: timestamp
docs: When the bid was made

fields.name: address
docs: Address of the bidder

fields.name: bidAmount
docs: Amount of the bid

fields.name: comment
docs: Up to 100 bytes long (base64 encoded)

errors.name: BumpSeedNotInHashMap
errors.msg: Bump seed not in hash map

errors.name: InvalidAuctionConfigBidTokenAccount
errors.msg: Invalid auction config bid token account
